trends.description: 90% of AI-DM tools prioritize local LLMs (Ollama) and on-device processing for privacy and zero cloud dependency
Knowledge retrieval from D&D 5e rulebooks via RAG is the dominant technical pattern (3/5 top projects)
Advanced projects adding voice: TTS narration and STT input for immersive gameplay
Backend predominantly Python (LLM integrations), frontend moving to React/Vite/TS

recommendations.text: Foundry VTT integration opportunity: Most tools are standalone, missing integration with dominant VTT platform
recommendations.rationale: Gap between AI-DM tools and actual VTT usage

recommendations.text: Common rulebook corpus: Multiple projects re-implementing D&D 5e RAG - opportunity for shared open dataset
Multi-agent DM systems: Current tools single-agent, opportunity for party-bot architecture
recommendations.rationale: NPC interaction depth limited with single LLM context
